data.query: Write a LinkedIn post for our next AI event in July. It's in SF but I don’t have the full details yet.
Can you draft a short LinkedIn post (under 60 words) for our 'Contoso Innovation Mixer' happening May 25?
Create a LinkedIn post for a Contoso Finance event highlighting our recent Q1 adoption data.
Make our next DevTools event post stand out—maybe tie it to a current industry trend?
Write a draft post for our climate tech hackathon. Tone should be bold and forward-thinking.
Find me a venue in SF for 300 people with breakout rooms and space for 50 demo PCs.
We need a venue for a 2-hour fireside chat on May 20. Budget is under $2,000. Can you help?
I need suggestions for a half-day leadership retreat + networking mixer in San Francisco.
Looking for a space for our 'Data in Action' event. Expect around 100 people. What do you recommend?
I want a venue for an enterprise roundtable. Make sure you include reviews and attendee feedback this time.
Send invites to everyone on my Q2 Leadership Summit invite list. The event is on May 21 at 2 PM.
Please invite Jordan Lee, Aria Winters, and Ravi Malhotra to tomorrow's design workshop at 10 AM.
Send invites to the Product and Marketing teams for the CX Roadmap briefing. It’s next Thursday.
Shoot out invites for the SF networking happy hour, yeah? Just use the regular list.
Create a 90-minute calendar event and invite my startup founders group. It’s a pitch feedback session.
Here’s the final post draft and image for our June 5 event. Go ahead and publish.
Post this approved LinkedIn copy. Image is still pending, but publish now anyway.
I have three approved drafts. Can I send them to you now to schedule back-to-back?
Oops, I gave you a blog post earlier. Can you pull the summary and publish that to LinkedIn?
Write a draft LinkedIn post for our upcoming event themed 'Designing with Inclusion in Mind.'
Here are all the event details—but don’t forget to include a call-to-action in your post.
Create LinkedIn drafts for two events: one on AI in education (May 28), another on Healthcare Tech (June 2).
Use this bland event title and date and turn it into something interesting for LinkedIn: 'Quarterly GTM Review, May 29.'
Make sure the LinkedIn post for our Smart City panel includes 4 good hashtags.
Can you write a LinkedIn draft for the Copilot Strategy Session that reflects our Contoso brand voice?
